text: usee ke paas paroksh kee kunjiyaan hai, jinhen usake siva koee nahin jaanata. jal aur thal mein jo kuchh hai, use vah jaanata hai. aur jo patta bhee girata hai, use vah nishchay hee jaanata hai. aur dharatee ke andheron mein koee daana ho aur koee bhee aardr (geelee) aur shushk (sookhee) cheez ho, nishchay hee ek spasht kitaab mein maujood hai
